title: I want my skin
body: It said you will unlock pentakill Olaf for this game and it never unlocked for me :/

replies.body: Oooooh I'm assuming you're referring to a skin boost you received. Let me know if you thought you were meant to keep the skin afterwards (skin boosts only work for one match), or if you were supposed to have a boost but it just didn't work.
yeah i dident get the boost but i dont think any did it
I had something like this happen. In an ARAM game in the chat it said I unlocked BB Zigs yet it wasn't unlocked and no one even used a boost.
